statements: SELECT * FROM meetup_events;
SELECT event_name, event_type, event_date FROM meetup_events WHERE event_type = 'Workshop';
SELECT event_name, event_location FROM meetup_events WHERE event_location LIKE '%London%';
SELECT event_id, event_date, event_description FROM meetup_events ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT event_id, event_name FROM meetup_events WHERE event_date > '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM meetup_events ORDER BY event_date DESC, event_name ASC
SELECT event_name, event_type, event_location FROM meetup_events WHERE event_type = 'Conference' ORDER BY event_date ASC
SELECT event_name, event_type, event_location, event_date FROM meetup_events WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01' AND event_location LIKE '%New York%'
SELECT event_name, event_type, event_date FROM meetup_events WHERE event_type IN ('Seminar', 'Workshop') AND event_name LIKE '%Tech%' ORDER BY event_date DESC
SELECT event_name, event_type, event_date, event_location FROM meetup_events WHERE event_description IS NOT NULL ORDER BY event_name ASC
SELECT * FROM digital_nomad_events;
SELECT event_id, event_name, event_type FROM digital_nomad_events ORDER BY date_time DESC;
SELECT event_name, location FROM digital_nomad_events WHERE event_type = 'Meetup';
SELECT * FROM digital_nomad_workshops WHERE workshop_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT workshop_name, presenter FROM digital_nomad_workshops WHERE duration > '1 day';
SELECT * FROM digital_nomad_events WHERE location = 'Remote' ORDER BY date_time DESC;
SELECT event_name, event_type, location FROM digital_nomad_events WHERE event_type = 'Meetup' ORDER BY event_name ASC;
SELECT event_name, date_time FROM digital_nomad_events WHERE event_name LIKE '%Workshop%' AND location IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM digital_nomad_workshops WHERE presenter = 'John Doe' ORDER BY workshop_date ASC;
SELECT workshop_id, workshop_name, workshop_topic FROM digital_nomad_workshops WHERE duration > '1 hour' ORDER BY workshop_date DESC;
SELECT event_name, location FROM meetup_events;
SELECT workshop_name, instructor FROM workshops ORDER BY workshop_id DESC;
SELECT conference_name, start_date, end_date FROM conferences WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT event_name, location FROM meetup_events WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT workshop_name, topic, instructor FROM workshops WHERE instructor = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM meetup_events WHERE event_name LIKE 'Tech%' ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT workshop_name, instructor FROM workshops WHERE instructor = 'John Doe' ORDER BY workshop_id;
SELECT conference_name, start_date, end_date FROM conferences WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY end_date ASC;
SELECT event_name, location FROM meetup_events WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY event_id DESC;
SELECT workshop_name, topic FROM workshops WHERE topic LIKE '%Python%' ORDER BY workshop_id;
SELECT event_name, event_date, event_location FROM meetup_events;
SELECT workshop_name, workshop_date FROM workshops WHERE workshop_location = 'Online';
SELECT conference_name, conference_date, conference_location, conference_theme FROM conferences ORDER BY conference_date DESC;
SELECT opportunity_name, opportunity_location, opportunity_description FROM networking_opportunities WHERE opportunity_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT event_name, event_type FROM meetup_events WHERE event_type IN ('Tech', 'Business') LIMIT 5;
SELECT event_name, event_type FROM meetup_events WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT workshop_name, workshop_topic FROM workshops WHERE workshop_date < '2023-01-01' ORDER BY workshop_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM conferences WHERE conference_location = 'New York' AND conference_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT opportunity_name, opportunity_location, opportunity_description FROM networking_opportunities WHERE opportunity_date = '2022-05-15';
SELECT event_name, event_location FROM meetup_events WHERE event_type = 'Tech' ORDER BY event_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM meetup_events;
SELECT event_id, event_name, event_date FROM meetup_events WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT workshop_name, workshop_location FROM workshops WHERE workshop_date = '2022-09-15';
SELECT conference_name, conference_location FROM conferences WHERE conference_date < '2022-08-30';
SELECT attendee_name, attendee_email FROM attendees WHERE attendee_event_id = 101;
SELECT event_name, event_date, event_location FROM meetup_events;
SELECT attendee_name, attendee_email, event_name FROM attendees INNER JOIN meetup_events ON attendees.attendee_event_id = meetup_events.event_id;
SELECT * FROM workshops WHERE workshop_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY workshop_date DESC;

SELECT conference_name, conference_location, COUNT(*) AS num_attendees FROM conferences INNER JOIN attendees ON conferences.conference_id = attendees.attendee_event_id GROUP BY conference_name, conference_location;

SELECT event_name, speaker_name FROM meetup_events INNER JOIN attendees ON meetup_events.event_id = attendees.attendee_event_id INNER JOIN speakers ON speakers.speaker_email = attendees.attendee_email;
